basics.name: Tiger Oakes
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Client-side performance focused software engineer offering 12+ years of experience leading multiple product launches, building 3 web browsers, hundreds of open-source projects, and cross-browser compatible W3C standards.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Coached 80+ engineers, wrote documentation, gave tech talks to significantly raise quality of testing, performance, & accessibility in high-traffic, high-scale web application.
Reduced thousands of developer man-hours by writing detailed tech specs and clear designs ahead of time.
Shipped multiple AI apps in just 2 months and saved significant back-and-forth work.
Leaned on by the entire org as subject matter expert in Web, JavaScript, React, CSS.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Created stronger testing culture by building better testing tools, documentation, and improving peer review processes.
Improved performance and code maintainability by inventing virtualization system for thousands of pages.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Doubled rendering performance and saved engineering time across all of Microsoft by leading design language & UI framework migration process with design, product, and engineering partners in 3 orgs and multiple teams. Resulted in an improved reusable components library getting promoted across the company.

work.name: Mozilla
highlights: Built and shipped brand new web browser in Kotlin to 100M+ users on Google Play Store.
Partnered with engineers at Google, Intel, and Apple to add maskable icon support to Firefox, Chrome, and Safari.
Featured Firefox in front of hundreds at Chrome Dev Summit 2019 keynote by adding Trusted Web Activity support.
Set web, Android, and iOS interaction standards as World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Invited Expert.
Onboarded 5K+ developers onto Compose UI by writing React to Compose dictionary docs.

work.name: Google
work.position: Android Engineering Intern - Chrome for Android
highlights: Increased new user retention and saved 100+ KB by building internal tool to analyze millions of Java APK methods.
Prevented significant release schedule delays by proactively identifying nearly exceeded Java resource limits.

projects.name: Open Source
highlights: Built Maskable.app, industry standard developer tool recommended by Google & CSS Tricks, used 11,000+ times/month.
Automatically prevented common bugs for 32M+ engineers/week by writing linter rules, such as in typescript-eslint.
Made it easier to ship Android apps in Google Bubblewrap & Microsoft PWABuilder, used 2,000+ times/month.
Produced Big Island Buses offline web app with County of Hawai'i, which won Congressional App Challenge 2014.

projects.name: Speaking and Writing
highlights: Speaker at JSConf Budapest, React Summit, CascadiaJS, and HalfStack conferences with thousands of attendees.
Wrote articles for MDN, Google web.dev, & CSS Tricks, some of the biggest frontend resources with audience of 10,000+.
Authored guidebook on MockK testing library for Kotlin and Android, with 20,000+ views/month.
Wrote React to Jetpack Compose Dictionary, resource recommended by Android team to new developers.
Mentoring new software developers through volunteering at Ada Developers Academy.

awards.title: UBC Work Learn International Undergraduate Research Award
Grand Prize: Congressional App Challenge 2014: Hawaiiâ€™s 2nd Congressional District
